Articles.Content:
I've been wanting to edit Minmus to have an extremely think atmosphere that lies only just above the lakes (in the canyon things).

Hyperedit can't do this is seems, is it because I have an ancient version (haven't updated since .21). Is it because of how outdated my plugin is or because it can't give Minmus an atmosphere?

I haven't really played around with HyperEdit much for tweaking planets, but to my knowledge you're able to adjust and add atmospheres for all bodies. Though I'm unsure how precise these controls are. I'll play around with it when I get home.
Giving Minmus an atmosphere height of 10000 with a pressure of 500000 didn't do anything (for reference Kerbin has a height of 5 and a pressure of 1). I did set the "Has Atmosphere" to true as well.

Yeah, just got home and tried it out. Doesn't look like any of the bodies without atmospheres can have atmospheres added. Tried it with Minmus, Mun, Vall, Bop and Gilly. None of the settings got me anywhere. I guess this is just an issue with Hyperedit?
